ovdesc.p: The ACTIVITY.API class is to used to define properties which has more then one pre/post routines merged from various levels of an AA product. User can define a combination of ACTIVITY.API based on the ACTIVITY, PROPERTY.CLASS and ACTION.

Say for example, we have product called HOME.LOAN at the top level, next we have Mortgage loan and Housing Loan under it at the second level and at the third level under Housing Loan we have Apartment Loan and Individual house Loan. So, we may like to check certain conditions or do some sort of calculation for each of these Levels. When, we define a Loan Product which comes under, say, Individual House loan scheme, but since it is derived from Housing Loan and again from HOME.LOAN, it should take all the relevant routines from all the three levels so that all conditions and calculations are taken into account.

RESETTING - During any Renewal Activities (for eg : change.product, rollover or reset) the property conditions will be reset from the product.

Leaving the field blank sets NON-RESETTING as the default option.
